title: A Knight in Distress
description: A knight in distress. A damsel in shining armor. A city to protect.  Knights are supposed to rescue damsels. So when Nathair, a knight in training, is rescued by the princess he's supposed to protect, he's annoyed. And when the princess proves she can fight like a knight? Well, that's enough for a boy to think about a career change.
author: Barbara Russell
